thread.title: BRIEF-Brigade Capital Management Says On March 8, The Brigade Funds Filed Shareholder Action Against Kindred Healthcare's Board

title: BRIEF-Brigade Capital Management Says On March 8, The Brigade Funds Filed Shareholder Action Against Kindred Healthcare's Board

organizations.name: the brigade funds filed shareholder action against kindred healthcare
brigade funds filed shareholder action against kindred healthcare's board reuters staff

text: March 9, 2018 / 6:43 PM / Updated 25 minutes ago BRIEF-Brigade Capital Management Says On March 8, The Brigade Funds Filed Shareholder Action Against Kindred Healthcare's Board Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 9 (Reuters) - Brigade Capital Management : * BRIGADE CAPITAL MANAGEMENT SAYS ON MARCH 8 THE BRIGADE FUNDS FILED SHAREHOLDER ACTION AGAINST THE KINDRED HEALTHCARE’S BOARD - SEC FILING * BRIGADE CAPITAL MANAGEMENT-BRIGADE FUNDS’ SHAREHOLDER ACTION SEEKS TO PRELIMINARILY,PERMANENTLY ENJOIN PROPOSED DEAL OF KINDRED HEALTHCARE BY CONSORTIUM‍‍​ * BRIGADE CAPITAL MANAGEMENT, LP REPORTS 5.7 PERCENT STAKE IN KINDRED HEALTHCARE AS OF MARCH 8, 2018- SEC FILING Source text : ( bit.ly/2IdqIR0 ) Further company coverage:
